response.job_title: Air Solutions for Oil & Gas | Compressed Air Skids |Nitrogen Generation |Blanketing |Projects |
response.summary:
E-mail: d.martinez@kaeser.com
Tel:      +57 312 479 7171
www.kaeser.com.co

Daniel Martinez is seeking to be a referent in OIL & GAS solutions when it comes to Air compression systems, Gas Generation, Blanketing, Mobile compressors and big scale projects with strong relation to ENERGY SAVINGS and PROCESS OPTIMITATION.
 
Broad experience in the Oil & Gas industry, seeking to develop strong relationships with CUSTOMERS in order to contribute with more reliable, robust and efficient SOLUTIONS that will help to improve your process.

Enjoys nature and outdoors, extreme sports and motor sports, haves a traveler and explorer soul.

profile_positions.description: Oil & Gas Sales Specialist in Air Compression, gas generation  Nitrogen and Oxygen, Skids of Instruments Air, Skids of Generation for Nitrogen Blanketing, Containers of Compressed air equipment, etc.
profile_positions.title: Oil & Gas Specialist

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the compression, pumping and cooling system business in Latin America and the Caribbean, this includes: design and construction of compression and pump packages, coordination of maintenance and operation schedules of Gardner Denver and SPX Cooling Equipment and SPX Cooling towers construction . Also, enhance the client confidence and increase GD and SPX market share in the region through attractive business opportunities improving the company profits.
profile_positions.title: Director of Operations

profile_positions.description:
Earned a reputation as an administrator of big scale contracts of parts and maintenance of Gardner Denver compressors and pumps and  SPX Cooling systems, with Halliburton and Ecopetrol.
Supervise and coordinate logistic of field maintenance services. Demonstrated advanced
skills in coordinating and overseeing engineering and projects department, selection and
integration of pumps, compressors, cooling and gas treatment equipment.
profile_positions.title: Chief Engineer

company.name: KAESER Compresores de Colombia S.A.S.
company.description: KAESER Compresores es uno de los más grandes y reconocidos proveedores de sistemas de aire con más de 5000 empleados alrededor del mundo.   Nuestro principal objetivo es prestar un servicio técnico de extraordinaria calidad, sumado a productos novedosos y a soluciones avanzadas para sistemas de aire en diversas aplicaciones.
